Key Match Events: The Knicks resorted to Brunson playing hero-ball at the end, and it didn't go well.
Fred VanVleet continues to be a Knick killer.
Jericho Sims being +14 despite having 0 points and 4 fouls and a turnover in 16 minutes is an early contender for funniest data point of the year.
Deuce was horrendous offensively and couldn't hit a layup.
The officials were weirdly bad, with some comparing it to Tim Donaghy's officiating.
Sims is criticized for having a low basketball IQ despite his athleticism.
Pre-Game Insights: Despite giving Sengun the bag, he has been playing poorly, shooting under 40% from the field, and only saw 21 minutes in their last game.
Keep an eye out for Tari Eason, who has great per minute stats but they keep benching for Dillion Brooks.
Matchups should be interesting with various defensive strategies discussed.
The Knicks have a difficult beginning of the season schedule, facing many playoff caliber teams.
Houston might put FVV on Bridges, which is a matchup Bridges can dominate.
The Rockets need a consolidation trade badly.
Vegas sees this as a very close game.
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks resorted to Brunson playing hero-ball at the end, and it didn't go well.
Brunson is missing shots he normally makes in the paint in crunch time.
The Knicks are having trouble with teams who switch everything, leading to too much mismatch hunting and 1 on 1 play.
The officials were weirdly bad, with some comparing it to Tim Donaghy's officiating.
Sims is criticized for having a low basketball IQ despite his athleticism.
Fred VanVleet continues to be a Knick killer.
Jericho Sims being +14 despite having 0 points and 4 fouls and a turnover in 16 minutes is an early contender for funniest data point of the year.
Deuce was horrendous offensively and couldn't hit a layup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks are #2 in FG percentage at 50.3%, #1 in 3 pt % at 41.7%, 2nd in true shooting % at 60.9%, 2nd in Effective Field goal % at 58.2%, 2nd in offensive rating at 123.2, and 3rd in turnovers at 11.2 per game.
Defense is currently 18th, but expected to improve.
The Knicks signed Matt Ryan, Boo Buie, and converted Ariel Hukporti to a 2-year standard deal.
Embiid suspended 3 games, with his first game back against the Knicks in the cup game.
Brendan Brown, former Knicks radio analyst and son of Hubie Brown, passed away.
